node.title: Atheism, Mysticism, New Age, Occultism, or Christianity?
node.description: Deniza Hush is a full-time mother of three and a home educator.  Her story starts back when she was a Muslim youth struggling with the thoughts and ideas of Atheism, mysticism, new ageism, and occultism.  In her journey to find truth in the midst of all her confusion, God helped her to find Him and ever since then she has been a devout follower of Jesus Christ.
